answers.answer: Hello,Burning sensation and itchy eyes can be due to lack of sleep or change in the power of accommodation of the eyes.Are you having any blurred vision also?If yes,then pls get your eyesight tested.Other possibilities are inflammation or infection of cornea or conjunctiva,irritation to cornea by some allergens and in some rare cases,diabetes and stroke.Pls seek an appointment with an ophthalmologist for your  complete examination and for figuring out the cause as without examination,diagnosis is tough.Hope it helps.Take care and pls do keep us posted on how you are doing.
